Name: CHAllergyIntoleranceConditionValueSet
Title: CH AllergyIntolerance Condition
Descriptino: CH AllergyIntolerance condition value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms速  values  for values from the manifestation of reactions value set PLUS findings for the documentation of allergy or intolerances in conditions as problem-list or as encounter-diagnosis as well as its absence (no know allergies)

Name: CHAllergyIntoleranceReactionManifestationValueSet
Title: CH AllergyIntolerance Reaction Manifestation
Descriptino: CH AllergyIntolerance reaction manifestation value set, including codes values according to the Allergy Reaction (GPS) - IPS value set from SNOMED Clinical Terms速  for the documentation of manifestation of allergy or intolerance reactions

Name: CHAllergyIntoleranceReactionSubstanceValueSet
Title: CH AllergyIntolerance Reaction Substance
Descriptino: CH AllergyIntolerance reation substance value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms速 substances for the documentation of substancies of allergy or intolerance reactions

Name: CHAllergyIntoleranceValueSet
Title: CH AllergyIntolerance
Descriptino: CH AllergyIntolerance coding value set. This value set includes codes values  from SNOMED Clinical Terms速 for no known [xy] allergies AND findings AND substances for the documentation of allergy or intolerance
